Docs.summary: Provides types that support serialization of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
